long_description: Made to fit women and built for cruising along the street, path or trail, the Pika features ample creature comforts, too: an easygoing upright ride, a comfort saddle and a suspension fork. Sturdy aluminum frame offers up a comfortable geometry for confident, upright riding; frame and fork feature disc brake tabs for an easy upgrade down the road. Suntour XCM V3 suspension fork supplies 80mm of travel to smooth out rough trails, paths and potholes. SRAM derailleurs offer smooth, reliable shifts, which are guided by the easy-to-use SRAM trigger shifters. Linear-pull brakes provide sure stopping power. Along with the frame and fork disc brake tabs, the hubs are disc-ready for a powerful, economical upgrade. Kenda combo tires handle transitions from trails to gravel roads with smooth-rolling performance and long wear. Comes equipped with platform pedals-no special shoes required. Specs on the Novara Pika women's mountain bike are subject to change.
